To [[my]0-i husband]178-my husband . [I]0-i guess love spells work after all , and there are happily ever afters . Thanks for being with [me]0-i through every crazy , chaotic moment . Thanks for keeping [me]0-i halfway sane , being [a fantastic father]179-a fantastic father , and most of all , for cooking dinner . [I]0-i love [you]180-you . Chapter One [Maggie Ryan]50-maggie tilted the margarita glass to [her]50-maggie lips and took a long swallow . Tartness collided with the salt , exploded on [her]50-maggie tongue , and burned through [her]50-maggie blood . Unfortunately , not fast enough . [She]50-maggie still had a shred of sanity left to question [her]50-maggie actions . The violet fabric - covered book beckoned and mocked . [She]50-maggie picked it up again , leafed through the pages , and threw it back on the contemporary glass table . Ridiculous . Love spells , for [God]51-god ’s sake . [She]50-maggie refused to stoop to such a low . Of course , when [[her]50-maggie best friend]182-her best friend , [Alexa]52-alexa , cast [her]52-alexa own spell , [she]52-alexa ’d been supportive and cheered [her]52-alexa actions to find [[her]52-alexa soul mate]183-her soul mate . But this was completely different . [Maggie]50-maggie cursed under [her]50-maggie breath and stared out the window . A sliver of moonlight leaked through the cracks of the organic bamboo blinds . Another evening gone . Another disastrous date . The demons threatened , and there was [no one here]184-no one here to fight [them]185-them back until dawn . Why did [she]50-maggie never feel a connection ? [This last one]186-this last one had been charming , intelligent , and easygoing . [She]50-maggie expected a sexual buzz when [they]187-they finally touched — or at least a lousy shiver of promise . Instead , [she]50-maggie got zilch . Zippo . Numb from the waist down . Just a dull ache of emptiness and a longing for . . . more . Despair toppled over [her]50-maggie like a cresting wave . The familiar edge of panic clawed [her]50-maggie gut , but [she]50-maggie fought back and managed to surface . Screw this . [She]50-maggie refused to have an attack on [her]50-maggie own turf . [Maggie]50-maggie grabbed the raw irritation like a life vest and breathed deeply and evenly . Stupid attacks . [She]50-maggie hated pills and refused to take them , positive the episodes would go away by [her]50-maggie own sheer force of will . Probably an early midlife crisis . After all , [her]50-maggie life was almost perfect . [She]50-maggie had everything [most people]188-most people dreamed about . [She]50-maggie photographed [gorgeous male models]189-gorgeous male models in underwear and traveled [the world]190-the world . [She]50-maggie adored [[her]50-maggie trendy condo]191-her trendy condo with no upkeep . [The kitchen]192-the kitchen boasted stainless steel appliances and gleaming ceramic tile . The modern espresso maker and margarita machine confirmed [her]50-maggie fun , Sex and the City status . Plush white carpets and matching leather furniture boasted no children and bespoke sheer style . [She]50-maggie did what [she]50-maggie wanted , when [she]50-maggie wanted , and made no damn apologies to [anyone]193-anyone . [She]50-maggie was attractive , financially comfortable , and healthy , aside from the occasional panic attacks . And yet , the question nibbled on the edge of [her]50-maggie brain with an irritating persistence , growing a bit more with each passing day . Is this it ? [Maggie]50-maggie stood and yanked on a silky red robe , then stuffed [her]50-maggie feet into [her]50-maggie matching fuzzy slippers with devil horns sprouting from the top of the foot . [She]50-maggie was drunk enough , and [no one]194-no one would ever know . Maybe the exercise would calm [her]50-maggie nerves . [She]50-maggie grabbed the piece of ledger paper and made a list of all the qualities [she]50-maggie craved in [a man]195-a man . Built the small fire . Recited the mantra . Gleeful cackles echoed in [her]50-maggie brain at the act of insanity , but [she]50-maggie shoved them back with another sip of tequila and watched the paper burn . After all , [she]50-maggie had nothing left to lose . • • • The sun looked pissed off . [Michael Conte]53-michael stood outside by [the waterfront property]196-the waterfront property and watched the perfect disc struggle to top [the mountain peaks]197-the mountain peaks . A fiery mingling of burnt orange and scarlet red rose , emanating sparks of fury , killing the remaining dark . Alive . [He]53-michael shook [his]53-michael head and mocked [his]53-michael own thoughts . [He]53-michael had nothing to complain about . [His]53-michael life was just about perfect . Chapter Two “ Here , take [the baby]1794-the baby . ”[50-maggie] [Maggie]50-maggie automatically caught [the infant]257-the infant as [[her]50-maggie brother]258-her brother pushed the wriggling handful into [her]50-maggie arms and hurried off . Prologue [Carina Conte]103-carina stared into the flickering flame of [her]103-carina homemade campfire and reminded [herself]103-carina [she]103-carina was n’t crazy . [She]103-carina was just [a woman in love]1670-a woman in love . [Her]103-carina hand trembled around the piece of paper . The violet fabric book of love spells nestled in the grass beside [her]103-carina feet . [She]103-carina glanced around and hoped to God [[her]103-carina family]1857-her family did n’t wake . [She]103-carina ’d promised [[her]103-carina sister - in - law]1672-her sister - in - law [she]103-carina ’d never attempt to cast a spell , but [Maggie]160-megan mulry did n’t need to know . Tucked toward the back of [the property]2001-the property , the scents of crackling burnt wood and sweet crocus filled [her]103-carina nostrils , and [she]103-carina prayed the firelight would n’t reveal [her]103-carina location . [Carina]103-carina glanced down at the page . Okay , time to summon [Earth Mother]128-earth mother . [She]103-carina hoped [Father Richard]83-father richard would n’t get upset . [She]103-carina quickly recited the words to summon the powers of female earth to conjure [her]103-carina [a man with all the qualities written on [her]103-carina list]1674-a man with all the qualities written on her list . Then threw the paper in the fire . Lightness flowed through [her]103-carina and [she]103-carina let out a relieved sigh . Done . Now all [she]103-carina had to do was be patient . [She]103-carina wondered how long [Earth Mother]128-earth mother usually waited to bestow [her]128-earth mother gift . Of course , [she]128-earth mother ’d made the job quite easy for [the entity]1675-the entity . Instead of a long list of qualities , [her]103-carina list held the power of one single name — the name of [the man [she]103-carina ’d been in love with [her]103-carina whole life]1676-the man she ’d been in love with her whole life . [The man who looked upon [her]103-carina as [a little sister]1678-a little sister ; who was worldly and sexy and dated some of [the most beautiful women in [the world]190-the world]1679-the most beautiful women in the world]1677-the man who looked upon her as a little sister ; who was worldly and sexy and dated some of the most beautiful women in the world . [The man who left [her]103-carina tongue - tied during the day and wracked [her]103-carina body with hot - blooded need during the night]1681-the man who left her tongue - tied during the day and wracked her body with hot - blooded need during the night . [Maximus Gray]171-maximus gray . [Carina]103-carina waited until the entire paper turned to ash , then dumped the bucket of water onto the fire . [I]1766-her will see [you]96-max tonight . ”[1766-her] [He]96-max nodded , still dumbstruck at the civil meeting [he]96-max ’d just witnessed . Do [I]53-michael hate it ? [Si]70-si . But [she]1766-her ’s [a grown - up]2093-a grown - up now , and needs to find [her]1766-her own way . ”[53-michael] [His]53-michael eyes shadowed . “ [I]53-michael am [[her]1766-her brother]258-her brother , not [[her]1766-her papa]2075-her papa .
